params._dappAddress: address of the dapp that permission will be given to
params._workerAddress: address of the worker node to given permission

params._dappAddresses: addresses of dapps that will lose permission
params._workerAddress: address of the proxy that will lose permission

Authorization(address,address,address).notice: A DApp has been authorized by a user for a worker

Deauthorization(address,address,address).notice: A DApp has been deauthorized by a user for a worker

authorize(address,address).notice: Gives worker permission to act on a DApp

deauthorize(address,address).notice: Removes worker's permission to act on a DApp

getOwner(address).notice: Get the owner of the worker node

isAuthorized(address,address).notice: Returns is the dapp is authorized to be called by that worker
